page.title: 15TRANSPORT IN CRANHAM
page.content:
Upminster is a{COMMUTER TOWN}and has excellent transport links with London. The{RAILWAY STATION}offers a frequent main line 20 minutes service to Fenchurch Street,and links to Southend,Tilbury and Romford. Upminster is a terminus of the District Line Underground with services to Ealing,Wimbledon and Richmond.There are also{9 BUS ROUTES.
Most people in Upminster run their own CARS with an average of 1.8 cars per family.FORDS are the most popular car,probably because we are so close to Fords main factory at{DAGENHAM. Located at a busy local crossroads between the A127 and the A12 traffic levels are high. There is very good access to the{M25 and the Dartford Tunnel.
